column2: Unique Fabricating, Inc. engages in the engineering, manufacture, and sale of foam, rubber, and plastic components. The company is headquartered in Auburn Hills, Michigan and currently employs 1,095 full-time employees. The firm offers various solutions, which consist of multi-material foam, rubber and plastic components. The Companyâ€™s fabricating capabilities include foam fabricating; foam die cutting; multi-layer die cutting; precision high-speed cutting; kiss cutting; fusion molding; vacuum forming; twin-sheet thermoforming; compression molding precision original equipment manufacturing (OEM) parts; non-metallic materials die cutting/fabrication; sound control parts, and soundproofing materials. The company uses its manufacturing processes to manufacture a range of products, including air management products, heating ventilating and air conditioning (HVAC), seals, fender stuffers, air ducts, acoustical insulation, door water shields, gas tank pads, light gaskets, topper pads, mirror gaskets and glove box liners.
